channel.title: Permissions
channel.description: Apparently I (As a logged-in user) do not have permission to edit pages in the User namespace, meaning I can't edit my user page/sub pages [quote] Member of groups: Autoconfirmed users, Users [/quote]

item.title: Permissions
item.dc:creator: FireTime
item.description:
Wiki should be updated to allow auto confirmed editors to edit user pages as well as user talk pages. I would have liked to leave them 100% open but it was the last safe haven for spammers.

Read full topic

item.title: Permissions
item.dc:creator: FireTime
item.description:
An intentional change to combat spam. (as 99% of spam was on user pages) I’m planning on giving auto confirmed users namespace access after a little while tho.

Sent from my phone using Tapatalk

Read full topic

item.title: Permissions
item.dc:creator: Cameron_D
item.description:
Apparently I (As a logged-in user) do not have permission to edit pages in the User namespace, meaning I can’t edit my user page/sub pages

Member of groups: Autoconfirmed users, Users

Read full topic
